text: Charles (or Charlie) Mackay, McKay, or MacKay may refer to: * Charles Mackay (author) (1814–1889), Scottish poet, journalist, author, anthologist, novelist, and songwriter * Charles McKay (1855–1883), American naturalist and explorer * Charles Mackay (mayor) (1875–1929), New Zealand lawyer, local politician, and Mayor of Wanganui * Charlie MacKay (1880–1953), Australian rules footballer and physician * Charles R. Mackay, Australian immunologist, fellow of the Australian Academy of Science * Charles MacKay (born 1950), American arts administrator
title: Charles Mackay
